title: clean, furnished, 1 parking, mo/mo, DT Kirkland
posting_body: DT Kirkland sunny condo with 2 bed, 2 bath, 1 covered secure parking spot near Urban.
Month to month, short term, 3-6 month or longer ok.
The condo is a happy place with 2 bedrooms, (separated by a living room), 2 55" TV on wall, 2 organic queen beds with headboards, bamboo sheets and towels.
The living, dining, kitchen and office nook area's are nicely furnished in soft grey and white tones.
There is a small deck that faces north and views a green space.
The kitchen is supplied with pots, pans, silverware, plates, glasses and utensils, along with a office nook and washer/dryer room.
The entrance to the condo is secure and with open air and is not closed off like a lobby entrance.
The building also has a front or back entrance to both 2nd
Ave or Kirkland Way for great walking.
This is a quiet, non-smoking, no pet condo.
Wifi is included, but electricity is not.
The pictures are true to the reality of the condo.
